\w The|strong="H0499"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Abisue, \w the|strong="H0499"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Phinees, \w the|strong="H0499"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* \w the|strong="H0499"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w the|strong="H0499"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0499"\w* \w beginning|strong="H7218"\w*.

\w This|strong="H1931"\w* Esdras \w went|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* \w ready|strong="H4106"\w* \w scribe|strong="H5608"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w granted|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w request|strong="H1246"\w*, \w according|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w there|strong="H5927"\w* \w went|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w some|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w singing|strong="H7891"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* porters, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* Nathinites \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7651"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Artaxerxes|strong="H0783"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H0935"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w fifth|strong="H2549"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w day|strong="H2320"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w began|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w go|strong="H0935"\w* \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H0935"\w* \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w day|strong="H2320"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w fifth|strong="H2549"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w according|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* Esdras \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w seek|strong="H1875"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w teach|strong="H3925"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* commandments \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w copy|strong="H6572"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w letter|strong="H5406"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w edict|strong="H1697"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Artaxerxes|strong="H0783"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* Esdras \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w scribe|strong="H5608"\w* \w instructed|strong="H1697"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* ceremonies \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w Artaxerxes|strong="H0783"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w kings|strong="H4430"\w* \w to|strong="H8065"\w* Esdras \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w priest|strong="H3549"\w*, \w the|strong="H1768"\w* most learned \w scribe|strong="H5613"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w law|strong="H1882"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w*, greeting.

It \w is|strong="H1768"\w* decreed \w by|strong="H7761"\w* me, \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w they|strong="H1768"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w people|strong="H5972"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3479"\w*, \w and|strong="H4437"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w priests|strong="H3549"\w* \w and|strong="H4437"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3879"\w* \w in|strong="H4437"\w* \w my|strong="H1768"\w* \w realm|strong="H4437"\w*, \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w are|strong="H1768"\w* minded \w to|strong="H2942"\w* go into \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*, should go \w with|strong="H5974"\w* thee.

\w For|strong="H1768"\w* thou art \w sent|strong="H7972"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w before|strong="H6925"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w his|strong="H7972"\w* \w seven|strong="H7655"\w* counsellors, \w to|strong="H5922"\w* visit Judea \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w* \w according|strong="H4481"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w law|strong="H1882"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0426"\w*, \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w in|strong="H0426"\w* thy \w hand|strong="H3028"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4430"\w* \w to|strong="H3390"\w* carry \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w silver|strong="H3702"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w gold|strong="H1722"\w*, \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w his|strong="H1768"\w* counsellors \w have|strong="H4430"\w* \w freely|strong="H5069"\w* \w offered|strong="H5069"\w* \w to|strong="H3390"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3479"\w*, \w whose|strong="H1768"\w* tabernacle \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1722"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w silver|strong="H3702"\w* \w and|strong="H1722"\w* \w gold|strong="H1722"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* thou shalt \w find|strong="H7912"\w* \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w province|strong="H4083"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w Babylon|strong="H0895"\w*, \w and|strong="H1722"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w people|strong="H5972"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w willing|strong="H5069"\w* \w to|strong="H5974"\w* offer, \w and|strong="H1722"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w priests|strong="H3549"\w* shall offer \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w their|strong="H3606"\w* own accord \w to|strong="H5974"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w their|strong="H3606"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w*, \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*,

Take freely, \w and|strong="H3702"\w* \w buy|strong="H7066"\w* \w diligently|strong="H0629"\w* \w with|strong="H5922"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w money|strong="H3702"\w*, calves, \w rams|strong="H1798"\w*, \w lambs|strong="H0563"\w*, \w with|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* sacrifices \w and|strong="H3702"\w* libations \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w them|strong="H1994"\w*, \w and|strong="H3702"\w* \w offer|strong="H7127"\w* \w them|strong="H1994"\w* upon \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w altar|strong="H4056"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w temple|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w your|strong="H5922"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w*, \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1722"\w* if \w it|strong="H5921"\w* seem \w good|strong="H3191"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H1722"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* thy brethren \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w do|strong="H5648"\w* any thing \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w rest|strong="H7606"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w silver|strong="H3702"\w* \w and|strong="H1722"\w* \w gold|strong="H1722"\w*, \w do|strong="H5648"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w according|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H4101"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w*.

\w The|strong="H1768"\w* \w vessels|strong="H3984"\w* also, \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w are|strong="H1768"\w* \w given|strong="H3052"\w* thee \w for|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* sacrifice \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0426"\w*, \w deliver|strong="H8000"\w* thou \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* sight \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w* \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4430"\w* whatsoever \w more|strong="H4481"\w* \w there|strong="H1768"\w* shall \w be|strong="H0426"\w* need \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w for|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0426"\w*, how much soever thou shalt \w have|strong="H4430"\w* \w occasion|strong="H5308"\w* \w to|strong="H4481"\w* spend, it shall \w be|strong="H0426"\w* given out \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w treasury|strong="H1005"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w king’s|strong="H4430"\w* exchequer, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w by|strong="H4481"\w* me.

\w I|strong="H0576"\w* \w Artaxerxes|strong="H0783"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w have|strong="H0576"\w* ordered \w and|strong="H4430"\w* decreed \w to|strong="H2942"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* keepers \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* public chest, \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w are|strong="H1768"\w* \w beyond|strong="H5675"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w river|strong="H5103"\w*, \w that|strong="H1768"\w* whatsoever Esdras \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w priest|strong="H3549"\w*, \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w scribe|strong="H5613"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w law|strong="H1882"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w*, shall \w require|strong="H7593"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w*, \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w give|strong="H7761"\w* it without delay,

Unto \w a|strong="H5705"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3969"\w* \w talents|strong="H3604"\w* \w of|strong="H1325"\w* \w silver|strong="H3702"\w*, \w and|strong="H3702"\w* unto \w a|strong="H5705"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3969"\w* cores \w of|strong="H1325"\w* wheat, \w and|strong="H3702"\w* unto \w a|strong="H5705"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3969"\w* bates \w of|strong="H1325"\w* \w wine|strong="H2562"\w*, \w and|strong="H3702"\w* unto \w a|strong="H5705"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3969"\w* bates \w of|strong="H1325"\w* \w oil|strong="H4887"\w*, \w and|strong="H3702"\w* \w salt|strong="H4416"\w* \w without|strong="H3809"\w* measure.

\w All|strong="H3606"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* belongeth \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* rites \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w*, let \w it|strong="H5922"\w* \w be|strong="H0426"\w* given diligently \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w*: lest \w his|strong="H5922"\w* \w wrath|strong="H7109"\w* \w should|strong="H4101"\w* \w be|strong="H0426"\w* enkindled \w against|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w realm|strong="H4437"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w his|strong="H5922"\w* \w sons|strong="H1123"\w*.
